review: I have been using the Apple TV for few years now, I have decided recently to purchase the Amazon fire TV and give it a try.The followings are my comments:-Nice packaging.-The Voice search actually works very well, but the results are always from the pay tv, however it works fine with Vevo app.-Can be side loaded easily, and any Android app can be installed.-The interface is OK, however I certainly prefer the Apple TV.-The quality of picture seems ok, I am not sure whether it is the same or leSs than that of Apple TV.The worst thing is that AFTER ONLY TWO DAYS of using the remote control, and upgrading the software of it to the latest, the remote control is not functioning well (I press one click on backspace, and as if I clicked several times, i press left two times but the cursor moves equivalent of several clicks....etc). This is really disappointing, and should not happen....it has never happened with my Apple TV remote control.In general it is a nice gadget, with great potentials considering the flexibility that Android system gives. However, there is plenty of room for improvement.
